text:
Tomás Félix Villanueva Rodríguez (25 February 1953 – 7 September 2017) was a Spanish politician. He was born in Valladolid, Spain. He served as a politician for the region of Castile and León. He served as the region's Vice President from 2001 through 2003.
Villanueva died of a heart attack on 7 September 2017 in Valladolid, Spain at the age of 64.
